function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of travel restrictions and social distancing measures in preventing the spread of infection","Impact":"Potential failure to contain the spread of infectious diseases, leading to continued danger and transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies to understand the impact of interventions and develop evidence-based guidelines for effective control measures","Technologies":"Data analytics, epidemiological modeling, and simulation tools to analyze the impact of interventions","People":"General public, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Poor understanding of SARS-CoV-2 transmission patterns and the impact of interventions","Impact":"Ineffective response to COVID-19 and other infectious diseases, leading to ongoing danger and transmission","Mitigation":"Invest in research and epidemiological studies to improve understanding of transmission patterns and intervention impacts","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, epidemiological surveillance, data analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, virologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive data on COVID-19 epidemiology, human movement, and public health interventions","Impact":"Inability to assess the effectiveness of control measures and make informed decisions about epidemic response","Mitigation":"Invest in data collection, integration, and sharing mechanisms to ensure access to accurate and timely information","Technologies":"Big data analytics, geocoding, data visualization tools","People":"Public health officials, researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
